data.title: CERT SPECIALIST m/f
data.description:
Job Description

Defining and supervising the implementation of the Airbus Information and Cyber Security Strategy aligned with the Airbus business objectives. Defining the Airbus Information Security Policies. Ensuring the compliance with company policies, laws and regulatory provisions within Airbus, the Extented Enterprise and Supply Chain through audit, tests and controls.

Addressing Information Security risks and mitigation in coordination with ICT and business functions risk management organizations. Liaising and lobbying with national and international security agencies as well as regulators and standardization bodies in the aeronautic industry. Ensuring that Airbus‚Äô programs & business functions assume their responsibilities with regards to all information classification and protection. Designing and conducting an efficient security communications and awareness program. Anticipating emerging trends and innovative technologies and their impact on information security.

The following accountabilities are described giving the scope of their applicability.

Ensure the Detection & Response to the most sophisticated cyberattacks are handled appropriately.
Ensure that Airbus group is aware of the cyber threats landscape

Perform Detection & Response technology watch

Manage Detection & Response related knowledge

Perform Threat Intelligence on attacker groups related to aeronautics and defence

Contribute to the writing of documents produced by the CERT (Research and publication as member of Airbus CERT, Detection & Response deliverables‚Ä¶)

Development, build and maintain Detection & Response tools

Ensure cyber crisis coordination or lead on a case by case basis

Represent Airbus CERT within working groups and in conferences throughout the world.

Contribute to threat hunting improvement through industrialization of intrusion analysis

Support divisions in understanding malwares targeting them.

Analyze incidents taking into account operational and national constraints


MAIN ACTIVITIES

Performing Threat Hunting

Conduct Malware Analysis in the context of threat hunting and TTPs discovery
Contribute to the effort of Threat Intelligence


Support Incident Response In Crisis Mode

Be part of the on-call crisis team (deployment reactivity constraints)
Perform reverse-engineering

Hosts forensic analysis


Contribute To The Industrialization Of

Malware analysis and clusterization
Tooling

Network analysis

Host analysis

Detection


Threat detection using system or network capabilities

YARA signatures
Network signatures

Integration of signatures into internal tools

Support for IOC searching across the enterprise

Development


Create or enhance Detection & Response projects

Participation to Detection & Response developments
Development of data mining capabilities (Hadoop/Pig)


Skills

Master's Degree in Information Technology or equivalent experience
Mastering at least one programming language
Strong knowledge and experience in penetration tests or Incident Response
English: Negotiation Level
At least 3 years of work experience in the IT security area
Good ability to understand Airbus policies and standards
Strong negotiation and communication skills in an international context
Ability to coordinate teams located in different organizations and locations

This job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the Company‚Äôs success, reputation and sustainable growth.

Airbus is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. We welcome all applications irrespective of social and cultural background, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation or religious belief.

About Elements




Elements is part of the Valiantys Group, a top Atlassian Platinum Solution Partner worldwide.

Since 2010,¬†Elements¬†has¬†enhanced the Atlassian platform with amazing apps which¬†facilitate teams to work faster and smarter.¬†With Connect, Checklist,¬†Spreadsheet and Copy&Sync, we've helped over 3,500 enterprises extend their Jira and Confluence capabilities, including Airbus, Apple, BBC, Ingenico, Nike, Oracle, Walmart and¬†Walt Disney.¬†




At Elements, we love and aspire to:

Release continuously on production
Migrate all our apps on Cloud¬†
Migrate to a¬†microservices¬†architecture¬†
Automatize boring tasks
Continuously learn and¬†share knowledge between teams
Use Agile methodologies
Cultivate continuous improvement




Job summary




Our business keeps growing and to achieve our ambitious goals, we are looking for an experienced Senior Full stack Developer/Architect.

Based in downtown Toulouse, you will report directly to our CEO.

You will be working in an Agile/Scrum environment.¬†You will develop new features for our products, help with the evolution of existing functionalities and create new products.

Apps development

Automated testing strategies

What you need to be successful




Development is your talent and you like to develop both Front and Back-end, all on a Java base but also build and maintain architectures. You have at least 10 years experience in Software Development including strong experience in Software architecture ideally in a Cloud environment.

You are curious and open-minded, you have no technical limits. A previous experience with different AWS services (EC2, S3,¬†CloudFormation, Auto Scaling, Elastic Load Balancer) would be fantastic.




You speak English, French and Java fluently.

You like to share, discuss and debate with your colleagues to get things done.

You are not afraid of innovation which means that you also are enthusiastic about learning and teaching (meet-ups, hackathons, training, blog articles, conferences ‚Ä¶)

The knowledge of the Atlassian Suite (Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket and Bamboo) would be a real plus.




What we offer¬†

Remote-work-friendly environment

Possibility to attend different conferences and meetings worldwide
Games, free coffee, tea and fresh fruits because we care about your health!

data.title: Network Engineer Level 2 - Ing√©nieur R√©seaux W/M
data.description:
Network Engineer Level 2 - Ing√©nieur R√©seaux W/M

In a constantly changing world, we work together with our people, clients and communities to enable them to fulfill their potential to do great things. We believe that by bringing everyone together, we can solve problems using innovative technology that can create a world that is sustainable and secure. At NTT, we encourage you to remain continuously curious, as that is what keeps you fast, flexible and relevant. No two days will be the same but that is what will help you grow and realize your full potential.

The power is in your hands to do great things. It‚Äôs time to lead the change, be the authentic you, to solve difficult challenges, to set the pace of change and to unleash your potential.

Want to be a part of our team?
In collaboration with the on-site team responsible for the management of our client‚Äôs infrastructure, you will be a technical reference on several network products.

You will coordinate and solve complex incidents, maintain the environment and manage changes according to SLA and associated service requirements.

Your Mission

Plan, assess risk, implement and document changes on various network components
Manage design, install and upgrade network solutions
Design and implement datacentre solutions:
Cisco Nexus 5k, 7k and 9K switches (10Nos)
Implement VPC to ensure a highly resilient and redundant infrastructure
Attach, configure and modify Cisco FEX to extend and expand backend services
F5 VIP creation
Implement EPG, Contract, Bridge Domain, VRF, L2ext, L3ext etc
Provide L2/L3 support for incidents and service requests as well as being an escalation point
Co-ordinate with ISP‚Äôs to implement and troubleshoot MPLS networks
Use tools like Cisco Jabber, Outlook, Any Connect for remote VPN, Liquid Planner and Service Now for ticketing

Hardware

Routers: Cisco 1800, 2900 and 3800 Series Routers, ASR 1k & 9K series
Switches: Cisco 3750, 3750-X, 3850, 4500-E, 4500-X, 6500, 9200, 9500 series
Nexus switches: Nexus 7000 series (7009), Nexus 5000 series (5548), Nexus 9000 series

Working at NTT

Required Experience

Advanced training in the field of networks and telecommunications. Proven experience of at least 3 years in network environments and preferably advanced skills in the below:

Routing: Static Routing, RIPv1, RIPv2, EIGRP, OSPF, BGPv4, GRE, IPv6, NAT, HSRP, VRRP, GLBP, DHCP, NTP, SNMP, IP SLA, AAA (RADIUS/TACACS+), MPLS, QoS, Route Filtering, Redistribution, Load Balancing, Multicasting, Summarization.

Switching: STP, PVST+, RSTP, MSTP, VTP, DTP, VLANs, Trunking, Layer 3 capabilities, Etherchannels,

Data center zoning, enhanced zoning, QTEAM, iSCSI,npv and npiv mode, ACI Fabric.

F5 LTM (Local Traffic Manager), Enterprise Manager, Application Security

Manager(ASM), (Access Policy ManagerCampus & WIFI Meraki

Cisco ISE, ACS, NGS, Catalyst 9K, 4G, 5G LTE, NAC, VLAN / VRF, DNS, Captive Portal, Malware / APT, VPN Ipsec & SSL

DevOps Ansible, AWS, Python, git, Jenkins, kubernetes, Docker

Certifications sought CCNP, CCIE (full), CCNP wireless, AWS

Fluency in English is required both orally and written, allowing you to explain complex technical events to different clients, colleagues and partners with varying levels of technical skill.

What will make you a good fit for the role?

Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today.

Equal opportunity employer

NTT is proud to be an equal opportunity employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, veteran status, or other protected category.

Job Description:

Our team is actively seeking a motivated and talented QA Developer who is passionate about testing software through automation.




You will be working in a small, collaborative and cross functional team where your autonomy and organisation skills will be highly appreciated. You will be designing automated testing methods and test plans for new applications and products part of our Naos product ecosystem, developed on a microservices architecture.




Your key responsibilities:




-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Design, develop and execute automated test plans to be integrated in our Continuous Integration / Continuous Development pipeline (web and Windows)

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Collaborate with our product and development teams to define test strategies

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Deliver test reports and provide feedbacks to developers

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Participate in the evolution of our process, tooling and methods by providing expertise in Software Quality Assurance and Automation




Our technical environment is in continuous evolution to integrate the latest technologies. Current frameworks and tools include:




-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Microsoft Visual Studio

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Team Foundation Server, Azure DevOps

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†MSTest, JUnit, Postman, Selenium‚Ä¶

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Windows servers (physical and VMs)

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Cloud (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform)

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Databases (Oracle, SQL server)

-¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Docker containers, Kubernetes







Requirements:

We require a degree in software engineering (MSc), and a minimum of 3 years‚Äô experience with software testing, including development of automated tests using Python and/or C# and hands on experience with the test automation tools and frameworks listed above.




Fluent French is required. English proficiency will be appreciated.

data.title: D√©veloppeur-euse web back PHP
data.description:
√Ä propos de Occitech
Occitech est un prestataire en d√©veloppement de solutions web m√©tier et e-commerce existant depuis 2006 avec une croissance continue et ma√Ætris√©e. V√©hiculant des valeurs humaines bien pr√©sentes et non galvaud√©es, les dirigeants ont √† c≈ìur de proposer √† leur √©quipe un cadre de travail agr√©able, une charge de travail soutenable, des projets int√©ressants et enrichissants et une transparence sur l‚Äôactivit√© et l‚Äôusage des b√©n√©fices.
Nous travaillons pour nos clients qui nous confient des projets de d√©veloppements m√©tiers ("sur mesure") sur base Symfony ou NodeJS en back, et souvent React en front. Nous travaillons √©galement sur des boutiques en ligne avec Magento, et bient√¥t OroCommerce voire Sylius.
Solidement ancr√©e dans l‚Äô√©cosyst√®me Toulousain, de par sa participation active aux meetups, nous pr√¥nons le partage du savoir dans l'√©quipe et en dehors de l'√©quipe.
Dans l'√©quipe, tout le monde travaille tant que c'est possible sur le m√™me projet en m√™me temps, pour diffuser les connaissances techniques et m√©tier.
Nous avons deux entreprises voisines en nos locaux, pilot√©es par les m√™mes dirigeants : Commit42, aussi prestataire en d√©veloppement web, et Ethersys, proposant des solutions d‚Äôh√©bergement et d‚Äôinfog√©rance web. Tout cela donne une joyeuse ambiance "web" certes, mais plurielle.
Description du poste
Nous sommes prestataires pour des clients, souvent locaux. Nous cr√©ons des webapp sur mesure et des boutiques en ligne.
Sur la partie "sur mesure", en back nous utilisons Symfony (PHP) ou NodeJS, et en front soit Twig (Symfony) soit souvent du React, avec une premi√®re exp√©rience r√©ussi avec Gatsby.
En e-commerce, nous avons beaucoup travaill√© avec Magento 1 & 2, et nous orientons vers OroCommerce et Sylius. Que des solutions bas√©es en PHP, mais sur certains projets nous utilisons Front-Commerce bas√© sur React + GraphQL.
Nous avons une forte culture des webperfs et une bonne exp√©rience en PWA.

data.description:
About Elements




Elements is part of the Valiantys Group, a top Atlassian Platinum Solution Partner worldwide.

Since 2010,¬†Elements¬†has¬†enhanced the Atlassian platform with amazing apps which¬†facilitate teams to work faster and smarter.¬†With Connect, Checklist,¬†Spreadsheet and Copy&Sync, we've helped over 3,500 enterprises extend their Jira and Confluence capabilities, including Airbus, Apple, BBC, Ingenico, Nike, Oracle, Walmart and¬†Walt Disney.¬†




At Elements, we love and aspire to:

Release continuously on production
Migrate all our apps on Cloud¬†
Migrate to a¬†microservices¬†architecture¬†
Automatize boring tasks
Continuously learn and¬†share knowledge between teams
Use Agile methodologies
Cultivate continuous improvement




Job summary




Our business keeps growing and to achieve our ambitious goals, we are looking for an experienced Senior Full stack Developer/Architect.

Based in downtown Toulouse, you will report directly to our CEO.

You will be working in an Agile/Scrum environment.¬†You will develop new features for our products, help with the evolution of existing functionalities and create new products.




About your daily tasks?¬†

Creation, architecture and development
Take part in our agile development team:
Apps development
Agile Scrum meetings
Knowledge sharing events
Code review
Automated testing strategies
Interpretation and design of technical briefings
Apps maintenance
Working closely with other team members on different competencies like Security, DevOps, and Automation.
Interact with Product Manager on apps development
Write technical documentation




Techno you will play with?

Java / Javascript ES6 / React / Typescript / Spring Boot / Maven / Webpack / IntelliJ¬†




What you need to be successful




Development is your talent and you like to develop both Front and Back-end, all on a Java base but also build and maintain architectures. You have at least 10 years experience in Software Development including strong experience in Software architecture ideally in a Cloud environment.

You are curious and open-minded, you have no technical limits. A previous experience with different AWS services (EC2, S3,¬†CloudFormation, Auto Scaling, Elastic Load Balancer) would be fantastic.




You speak English, French and Java fluently.

You like to share, discuss and debate with your colleagues to get things done.

You are not afraid of innovation which means that you also are enthusiastic about learning and teaching (meet-ups, hackathons, training, blog articles, conferences ‚Ä¶)

The knowledge of the Atlassian Suite (Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket and Bamboo) would be a real plus.




What we offer¬†




Generous lunch voucher
Free Comprehensive mutual health insurance
Annual profit sharing
Remote-work-friendly environment
International work environment and a multicultural team
Focus on personal development with various knowledge sharing events and projects
Possibility to attend different conferences and meetings worldwide
Games, free coffee, tea and fresh fruits because we care about your health!
